category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOM_hide_unreadable_lines
preference.preference_description: For the user from the specified groups, unreadable lines will be hidden. Valid Values: - None: Unreadable lines are displayed with the name <<UNREADABLE>>. This is the default value. - All: Unreadable lines are not visible. - group name,group name : For the users from the specified group(s), the unreadable lines will be hidden.
